title: Add Edit Interface for Tickets
description: Implement a webview panel for editing tickets, including subtasks management and support for creating new tickets with temporary items during editing

title: Add VS Code Command for Editing Tickets
description: Register a command in the extension to open the edit webview panel for a selected ticket

title: Implement Webview Panel for Ticket Editing
description: Create the webview panel, load HTML form, handle basic message passing

title: Design and Implement Edit Form UI
description: Build the HTML form with fields for title, description, type, priority, and subtasks list

title: Implement Subtasks Management in Form
description: Add functionality to add/remove subtasks in the edit form

title: Handle Saving Existing Tickets
description: Implement save logic for updating existing tickets via message passing

title: Handle Creating New Tickets
description: Support temporary ticket creation and saving to permanent on form submit

title: Add Command for Creating New Tickets
description: Register command to open empty edit form for new tickets
